title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Titanic
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

title: La La Land
plot: A jazz pianist falls for an aspiring actress in Los Angeles.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, and more through the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: Avatar
plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to Pandora on a mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting his new home.
